about_the_game:
#BeTheNextOne

Start your driving career and join the World Rally Championship thanks to WRC 9! The FIA, WRC Promoter and Nacon are teaming up to organize FIA ​​Rally Star, the world's first selection program for future young drivers using the official WRC video game.

17 road races from February to December 2021: at the end of these events, contested exclusively on the new M-Sport Fiesta Rally3, the 17 winners will qualify for one of the six continental finals.
At the end of these finals, the top 7 pilots, including at least one female, will benefit from an exclusive training and competition training program. For the best, the adventure will continue with 2 seasons in the FIA ​​Junior WRC Championship!
An incredible opportunity to go from dream to reality for any rally fan aged 17 to 26!
